channel.title: stacking freind points
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "stacking freind points" - Tictac & j-diddy

item.title: Re: stacking freind points
item.content:encoded: Oo thanks, this info is much appriected

item.title: Re: stacking freind points
item.content:encoded: They do stack, and it is 8x's as much. Combine with Love Love Paradise, and it's 16x. Combine with Battle of Champions theme, and it's 32x. Combine with the HoClaus jutsu and it's 64x. It is possible to get 1,600 friend points per mission this way.

item.title: stacking freind points
item.content:encoded:
im trying to get freind points up on bruce jr, and was wonduring if tic tac and jdiddy's ability stack, as in would i gain 8 times as much freind points before they are split up so a third ally could have 8/3 the normal amount instead of 4/2?

for either anser, someone should make a note on the characters page (tictac/and j-diddy)
